item.title: PAT1065. A+B and C (64bit) (20)
item.description:
模拟，大数

题意

判断两数和是否大于另一数

细节

  • 输入包含＼(2^63＼)

代码

#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long ull;
ull a,b,c;
int fa,fb,fc;

void gaoin(ull &a,int &f){
    char ch;
    cin>>ch;
    if(ch=='-') f=1;
    else cin.putback(ch);
    cin>>a;
}
bool gao(){
    if(!fa && fc) return 1;
    if(fa && !fc) return 0;
    if(!fa && !fc) return a>c;
    return a<c;
}
int main(void) {
    freopen("d.in","r",stdin);
    int n,i;
    ull m=1;
    m=m<<63;
    cin>>n;
    getchar();
    for(i=1;i<=n;++i){
        fa=fb=fc=0;
        gaoin(a,fa);
        gaoin(b,fb);
        gaoin(c,fc);
        printf("Case #%d: ",i);
        if(!fa && !fb){
            if(fc || a==m && b==m) printf("true\n");
            else{
                if(a+b>c) printf("true\n");
                else printf("false\n");
            }
        }else if(fa && fb){
            if(!fc || a==m && b==m) printf("false\n");
            else{
                if(a+b<c) printf("true\n");
                else printf("false\n");
            }
        }else if(!fa && fb){
            if(a>=b){
                fa=0;
                a-=b;
            }else{
                fa=1;
                a=b-a;
            }
            printf("%s\n",gao()?"true":"false");
        }else{
            if(a>b){
                fa=1;
                a-=b;
            }else{
                fa=0;
                a=b-a;
            }
            printf("%s\n",gao()?"true":"false");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: PAT1064. Complete Binary Search Tree (30)
item.description:
数据结构，二叉树

题意

求给出序列组成的唯一的二叉搜索树

细节

  • 按层构造树，结点数控制大小
  • 中序遍历将排序后的键值加入树

代码

#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int two[16],l[1010],r[1010],a[1010],p[1010],cnt;
void gao(int u){
    if(l[u]!=-1) gao(l[u]);
    p[u]=a[cnt++];
    if(r[u]!=-1) gao(r[u]);
}
int main(){
    freopen("d.in","r",stdin);
    int n,i,m,j,d;
    two[0]=1;
    for(i=1;i<=15;++i) two[i]=two[i-1]<<1;
    memset(l,-1,sizeof(l));
    memset(r,-1,sizeof(r));
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;++i) scanf("%d",a+i);
    sort(a,a+n);
    i=1;
    d=0;
    while(i<n){
        for(j=two[d]-1;j<=two[d+1]-2 && i<n;++j){
            l[j]=i++;
            if(i<n) r[j]=i++;
        }
        ++d;
    }
    gao(0);
    printf("%d",p[0]);
    for(i=1;i<n;++i) printf(" %d",p[i]);
    return 0;
}

item.title: PAT1063. Set Similarity (25)
item.description:
数据结构，集合

题意

求某两个集合的交集、并集大小

细节

  • 使用set_intersection()函数求交集
  • 并集大小由交集直接s计算

代码

#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<set>
using namespace std;
set<int> s[51],now;
int main(){
    freopen("d.in","r",stdin);
    int n,m,i,j,a,b;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=1;i<=n;++i){
        scanf("%d",&m);
        while(m--){
            scanf("%d",&j);
            s[i].insert(j);
        }
    }
    scanf("%d",&m);
    while(m--){
        scanf("%d%d",&i,&j);
        now.clear();
        set_intersection(s[i].begin(),s[i].end(),s[j].begin(),s[j].end(),inserter(now,now.end()));
        a=now.size();
        b=s[i].size()+s[j].size()-a;
        printf("%.1f%%\n",100.0*a/b);
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: PAT1062. Talent and Virtue (25)
item.description:
快排

题意

给出每人的道德值和智慧值，将合格的人按要求排列

细节

  • 按规则入选人可分4类

代码

#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
using namespace std;
struct S{
    int id,t,v;
    bool operator<(const S& T)const{
        if(t+v!=T.t+T.v) return t+v>T.t+T.v;
        if(v!=T.v) return v>T.v;
        return id<T.id;
    }
}p[4][100010];
int cnt[4];
int H,L,t,v,id;
int gett(){
    if(v>=H && t>=H) return 0;
    if(v>=H) return 1;
    if(v>=t) return 2;
    return 3;
}
int main(){
    freopen("d.in","r",stdin);
    int n,i,j;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&L,&H);
    while(n--){
        scanf("%d%d%d",&id,&v,&t);
        if(v<L || t<L) continue;
        i=gett();
        p[i][cnt[i]].id=id;
        p[i][cnt[i]].v=v;
        p[i][cnt[i]++].t=t;
    }
    n=0;
    for(i=0;i<4;++i){
        n+=cnt[i];
        sort(p[i],p[i]+cnt[i]);
    }
    printf("%d\n",n);
    for(i=0;i<4;++i){
        for(j=0;j<cnt[i];++j){
            printf("%08d %d %d\n",p[i][j].id,p[i][j].v,p[i][j].t);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: PAT1061. Dating (20)
item.description:
模拟，字符串

题意

找到对应位置相同的字符，按要求输出

细节

  • 第1个字符为星期，范围A～G

代码

#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
using namespace std;
char a[65],b[65],c[65],d[65];
char day[7][4]={"MON","TUE","WED","THU","FRI","SAT","SUN"};
int main(){
    freopen("d.in","r",stdin);
    scanf("%s%s%s%s",a,b,c,d);
    int i,week,h,m;
    for(i=0;a[i] && b[i];++i){
        if(a[i]>='A' && a[i]<='G' && a[i]==b[i]){
            week=a[i]-'A';
            break;
        }
    }
    for(++i;a[i] && b[i];++i){
        if((a[i]>='A' && a[i]<='N' || a[i]>='0' && a[i]<='9') && a[i]==b[i]){
            if(a[i]>='A') h=a[i]-55;
            else h=a[i]-48;
            break;
        }
    }
    for(i=0;c[i] && d[i];++i){
        if((c[i]>='A' && c[i]<='Z' || c[i]>='a' && c[i]<='z') && c[i]==d[i]){
            m=i;
            break;
        }
    }
    printf("%s %02d:%02d",day[week],h,m);
    return 0;
}

item.title: PAT1060. Are They Equal (25)
item.description:
模拟，大数

题意

给出两个浮点数和有效位，判断是否相等

细节

  • 0的指数为0

代码

#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
using namespace std;
char a[110],b[110];
char x[110],y[110];
int n,na,nb;
void gao(char *a,char *x,int &na){
    int i,p=strlen(a),j=0,f;
    for(i=0;i<n;++i) x[i]='0';
    for(i=0;a[i];++i){
        if(a[i]=='.') p=i;
        else if(a[i]!='0') break;
    }
    if(!a[i]){
        na=0;
        return;
    }
    f=i;
    for(;a[i];++i){
        if(a[i]=='.') p=i;
        else x[j++]=a[i];
    }
    if(f>p) na=p-f+1;
    else na=p-f;
    x[n]=0;
}
void out(char *x,int &na){
    printf(" 0.");
    printf("%s",x);
    printf("*10^%d",na);
}
int main(){
    freopen("d.in","r",stdin);
    scanf("%d%s%s",&n,a,b);
    gao(a,x,na);
    gao(b,y,nb);
    if(na==nb && strcmp(x,y)==0){
        printf("YES");
        out(x,na);
    }else{
        printf("NO");
        out(x,na);
        out(y,nb);
    }
    return 0;
}
